'''''Amon Hen'' 113''' is the one-hundred-and-thirteenth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in January [[1992]].

[[Christina Scull]]'s review of ''[[The Marvellous Land of Snergs]]'' contains two sentences quoted from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s manuscript of ''[[On Fairy-Stories]]'' (which were not included in the text published in ''[[Essays Presented to Charles Williams]]'').<ref>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=31460 Amon Hen. 1992] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net/ TolkienBooks.net] (accessed 10 October 2011)</ref>

** By: Tom Sherry
* Editorial
** By: Nick Brown

** By: various contributors
* Notices
* Reports
** By: various contributors
* 'Myth & Magic' reviews
** By: various contributors
* Mathom
** By: Gwyneth Morgan
* Letters
* Rings of Power - Part II
** By: Len Sanford
* Tolk Folk
* Where to Write (Committee)
* Additional Calligraphy and Artwork
** By: Kirsty Beck, Neil Loughran, Susanne Stopfel, Marian Haas, Rob Brown, Steve Lines, Walter Clark, Ian Collier & Martin Roe
